name: Maze Run (Metalmario1018)
description:
Fullscreen: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/639263055/embed

(if the game refuses to connect you can play it in fullscreen)

Controls:

-Press WASD to move

Notes:

-Don't touch the maze or you will lose points and be teleported back to the start!

-Dodge the red stuff

-if you touch the green square it will give you points!
